Isabella Rodriguez.description: working at the counter, serving customers and preparing for the upcoming potluck (communicating with customers about the potluck) @ the Ville:Hobbs Cafe:cafe:cooking area

Maria Lopez.description: conversing about Maria Lopez and Klaus Mueller are making plans to meet at Hobbs Cafe tomorrow at 3pm to discuss volunteering opportunities with Community Builders in relation to the impact of gentrification in different communities. @ <persona> Klaus Mueller
chat: Hey Klaus, I was just thinking more about our previous conversation on gentrification and volunteering with Community Builders. Have you had a chance to look into it more?

Hey Maria, yes, I've done some research on it. I found some interesting data on the impact of gentrification in different communities. I think we should definitely explore volunteering opportunities with Community Builders. When are you free to sit down and go over the details?
I'm free tomorrow afternoon after my physics class. How about we meet at Hobbs Cafe around 3pm?
That works for me. I'll see you tomorrow at 3pm at Hobbs Cafe.
